document_data.name: Breg
document_data.mainbody:
Sharp-eye '''Breg''' was a [[goblin]] scout and member of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] who dwelled within the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|You gotta...listen to Crusher. 'E get's mad if you don't. Mad.|Breg.}}
document_data.Description: He had blotchy yellow-green skin and light brown hair he kept brushed over to one side. He dressed in simple cloth clothes, leather gauntlets, and pieces of salvaged metal armor.
document_data.Relationships: Breg was intimated by [[Crusher]], a mighty goblin warrior and novice of [[the Absolute]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Breg was among the goblin cultists celebrating the successful raid of the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn at the Shattered Sanctum.
